summary: Starter tier website plan for The Flower Box: a fast, template-based site with minimal copy and essential sections to showcase products, shop location, and contact details.
style_notes: Use a clean, floral-themed template (e.g., Bootstrap or Shopify Simple). Colors: pastel pink/green palette with white background. Typography: sans-serif (e.g., Open Sans) for readability. Minimalist layout with generous white space, 2–3 grid columns for product grid. Hover effects on product images. Mobile-first responsive design. Simple navigation bar with logo on left, menu on right.
assets_needed: Hero image of storefront or floral arrangement (1600x600)
Map image or embed placeholder for location
Optional: small testimonial photo(s) if available
